text: Kogda ty uvidish' takikh, kotoryye pogruzhayutsya v potok pustosloviya o nashikh znameniyakh, to udalis' ot nikh, pokuda oni ne opustyatsya v potok rasskazov o drugom chom libo; yesli satana proizvedot v tebe zabveniye ob etom, to ty, opomnyas', ne ostavaysya v besede s etimi nechestivymi lyud'mi
